updates.title: AFCON 2025 Opening Ceremony Announced
updates.content: The spectacular opening ceremony will take place at Stade de Marrakech on January 15th, featuring traditional Moroccan performers and international artists.

updates.title: Team Arrivals Update
updates.content: All 24 qualified teams have arrived in Morocco for AFCON 2025. Training sessions begin tomorrow at various venues across the host cities.

updates.title: Match Schedule Confirmed
updates.content: The complete tournament schedule has been finalized. Group stage matches will be played across five venues in Morocco, with the final scheduled for February 11th in Marrakech.
